Class ModemImpl

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.BaseObjectImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.ModemImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SonarObject, Modem, Storable
public class ModemImpl extends BaseObjectImpl implements Modem
A Modem represents an old-skool analog modem.
Author:
Douglas Lau
